title: Black screen
body: So ever since the patch 7.1 dropped there has been a black screen issue where it enters the loading screen and game but only the sound is heard with a black screen. I saw other players have this problem aswell and saw the little excalamation mark thingy pointing out the problem. Since then I played in windowed and when excalamation mark thingy dissapeared I tought it was resolved but it turns out it wasn't (at least for me). Any ideas on how to fix it since in windowed my FPS is gutted.

replies.body: It sounds like you did successfully connect to the match, but something like a driver or hardware issue preventing the game from actually rendering.  Go over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubleshoot, but test it out in a custom game to prevent any penalties.  Let me know if you have any questions!
